summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correct operation of the StatevectorSampler primitive, ensuring it properly processes various quantum circuit configurations, handles classical registers, parameterized and unitary circuits, respects shot counts and seeding, and raises appropriate errors under invalid conditions.
business_intent: Validate the reliability and correctness of the StatevectorSampler component within the Qiskit framework, providing confidence for developers and preventing regressions in quantum sampling functionality.
